title: The Unorganised manager. Part I. Damnation (NP)
brief_description: Provides an overview of time management and delegation techniques. “Damnation” shows Richard Lewis, an unorganised manager, doing jobs he need not do, wasting his time and the time of others. He becomes so stressed he suffers a coronary. Cast includes John Cleese, James Bolan. FOR USE ONLY IN A DOMESTIC SITUATION OR FOR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY.
